ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 465
ygData.msgSnippet: I have transferred 1000 pp into all copper, turned on selo s and been able to walk...not fast, but you CAN walk with it.  I think they coded encumberance like
ygData.messageBody:
I have transferred 1000 pp into all copper, turned on selo's and been able
to walk...not fast, but you CAN walk with it. I think they coded
encumberance like root, so selo's releases you from it. It was sorta like
walking while snared, long travels would not be recommended. :P

Arithon

> On Tue, 26 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
> >
> > Heheh - dearest sister - I don't care if you twist chant, anthem,
> warsong
> > and selo's - with 3210gp you would NOT be able to walk to the door much
> > less run to somewhere in Rathe Mts - not even with a MM drum. But I am
> sure
> > someone will try! <g>
>
> Bah, it's about 81 pounds. You can run with it just fine.
> With Accelerando and a drum, you'll probably still be faster
> than SoW unencumbered (with a MM drum you definitely will be).
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
